Variables
  __package__ = 'imusim.maths'
Function Details

matrixToEuler(m, order='zyx', inDegrees=True)

source code 

Convert a 3x3 rotation matrix to an Euler angle sequence.

Parameters:
  • m - 3x3 np.matrix, or equivalent, to convert.
  • order - The order of the Euler angle sequence, e.g. 'zyx'
  • inDegrees - True to return result in degrees, False for radians.
Returns:
np.ndarray of Euler angles in specified order.

matrixFromEuler(angles, order, inDegrees=True)

source code 

Generate a rotation matrix from an Euler angle sequence.

Parameters:
  • angles - Sequence of Euler rotation angles.
  • order - Sequence of rotation axes. Rotations are applied sequentially from left to right, i.e. the string 'zyx' would result in rotation about the Z axis, then the new Y axis, and finally about the new X axis.
  • inDegrees - Whether the angles are in degrees (`True`) or radians (`False`)
Returns:
3x3 rotation matrix corresponding to the Euler angle sequence.
